entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The app crashes under .NET7 in Docker with "Fatal error. The RW block to unmap was not found" #80580
  • CI failure: Networking tests failing with 'No such host is known' #80578
  • [6.0] Mono Linux CI failure: System.Console SetOut.SetOutReadToEnd #80575
  • [6.0] WASM CI failure: WorkloadManifestCompositionException: Workload manifest dependency 'Emscripten' version '6.0.4' is lower than version '6.0.13' required by manifest 'mono.toolchain' #80574
  • [Mono] Intrinsify System.Numerics.Vector and System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector128 API's with mini JIT on Arm64 #80566
    8.0.0
  • Refine field types based on a derived type's generic instantiation of its base class to devirtualize virtual calls #80564
    Future
  • Process.WaitForExit() deadlock when running multiple processes on linux with .net7 #80563
  • Obsolete constructor public StackTrace(Thread targetThread, bool needFileInfo) #80555
  • NET7 macOS: Missing dSYM files for libcoreclr (and others) #80550
  • DateTime.AddSeconds(double) precision error #80549
    Future
  • Enable functional tests for Apple platforms to have a custom native main #80545
    8.0.0
  • Long running test: CounterSampleCalculator_ElapsedTime #80543
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_HashCode #80568
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Matrix4x4 #80567
  • Regressions in IfStatements.IfStatements and Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteJson<SimpleStructWithProperties> #80565
  • Implement CryptoStream Write overload that takes ReadOnlySpan #80540
  • Static constructor on an interface is not invoked #80538
  • [API Proposal]: Support for Atomic "Interlocked" operations on arbitrary length structs #80535
  • [API Proposal]: Add a LogError overload that returns the exception argument. #80530
    Future
  • JsonSerializerOptions.GetTypeInfo throws when TypeInfoResolver is `null` #80529
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Add support for MissingMemberHandling to System.Text.Json #37483
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: RandomDataGenerator #73864
    8.0.0
  • DateTime.ToString() behavior diverged in ru-RU locale in alpine on 7.0.2 #80542
  • Expose Vector512<T> to support the x86/x64 AVX-512 instruction set #73262
    8.0.0
  • DateTime.ToString() on alpine-3.17 are broken #80551
    Future
  • A bug in FileStream (async + buffer) since .Net 6? #80344
  • Getting managed assembly entrypoint on diagnostic pipe GetProcessInfo2 command during suspension #56808
    Future
  • RSA.SignHash does not reliably work with the Platform Crypto Provider #80444
  • HttpClient tries to verify the certificate issuer in Azure App Service #80238
  • CI failure: Unhandled timeout exception in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_InstanceMethods_DefaultTimeout_Throws #77814
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Type.Namespace returns `null` for arrays of a nested type #42633
    8.0.0
  • Apps crashing when using ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory #78165
  • System.Net.Quic QuicListener sets QuicAddr.Family incorrectly for the requested IPAddress type #80248
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\ValueNumbering\\ExposedLocalsNumbering\\ExposedLocalsNumbering.cmd #80533
  • The CustomAttributeTypeNameParser is not able to translate generics correctly #80462
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility. #80581
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [TEST] DualModeSocketTest changes #80577
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [release/7.0] Remove ConcurrentDictionary from the shared JsonSerializerOptions cache implementation. #80576
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.x
  • Prevent tests from importing "normal" NuGet props/targets #80573
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Dispose archive stream after the list of DataStreams #80572
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Permit CngKey backed ECDH interoperability from different KSPs #80571
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0] Fix Configuration to ensure calling the property setters. #80562
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Use MemoryExtensions.Equals in CharArrayHelpers.EqualsOrdinalAsciiIgnoreCase #80561
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Avx512 upper regs var macros #80559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add tests for exercising certificates with platform provider keys #80558
    area-System.Security
  • Make System.Collections.Immutable adhere to repo's var policy #80556
    area-System.Collections
  • [release/7.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80553
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80552
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer #80548
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net, os-android
  • Enable specifying custom native main source with AppleAppBuilderTask #80546
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Changed handle table scanning so that we would scan all slots for any heap count we may have. #80541
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Removing old variable debug info tracking system #80537
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • allow to set custom serial speed on Linux #80534
    os-linux, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Moving GetCurrentProcessorId() to shared #80532
    area-System.Threading
  • WIP testing #80531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ICorProfiler API to allow profiler created providers to have a callback when a session enables them #80528
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Move a regression test out of CI #80399
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add support for JsonUnmappedMemberHandling #79945
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Replace unnecessary string.Replace in ManifestBuilder.GetTypeName #80557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [release/7.0] Fix delegate allocation in CachingContext.GetOrAddJsonTypeInfo #80513
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Invalidate buffered data when bypassing the cache #80503
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix parsing the output of `ping` on Samsung phones #80502
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] [mono][debugger] Fix Debugger.Break() behavior when running on release mode #80497
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #80120
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Process.Unix: while reaping all processes, handle encountering direct children. #80433
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Update dotnet host for testing and fix failing globalization test #80560
    area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Invalidate buffered data when bypassing the cache #80554
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.14
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #80121
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 6.0.14
  • Fix most violations of new CA1859 #80335
    area-Meta
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add tests for frozen collections #80395
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix Configuration to ensure calling the property setters. #80438
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0] Do not override content root with default #79411
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] [browser] make dynamic import cancelable #80312
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.3
  • [6.0] Disable GetProviderNames_AssertProperties test #80512
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Invalidate buffered data when bypassing the cache #80432
    area-System.IO
  • Get entry assembly name from host for GetProcessInfo2 command during suspension #80301
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix small buffer handling with the Platform Crypto Provider #80457
    area-System.Security
  • Fix timeout in regex source generated test #80459
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix NetFramework name in Directory.Build.targets #80440
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Ensure the right TFM is referenced in STJ sourcegen tests. #80509
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix build invocation on Windows without os param #80544
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Fixed getting namespace names of array types. #80426
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove two string.Replace calls from CreditCardAttribute.IsValid #80523
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • Disable `ExposedLocalsNumbering` #80522
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Implement more jiterpreter opcodes #80520
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript

Updated

  • Fix security transparency issue #80478
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] CreateDump: Only add pages with committed memory #80005
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf helpers in more places #80355
    area-Meta
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    area-Meta
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement Startup hooks support in Mono #80391
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2087105 #80505
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Strip all symbols on macOS as well #80515
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Partially fix issue caused during VS upgrade #79572
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.14
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [browser] make default initial memory size 16MB #80507
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Allow some intrinsics in Tier0 (e.g. Enum.HasFlag) #77357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fold string fields in structs stored in static readonly fields #80431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #80106
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Introduce TieredPGO_InstrumentedTierAlwaysOptimized for PGO tests #80524
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Emit mneg for mul+neg on Arm64 #79550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [eventpipe] Support arrays of primitive types as struct members #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Suppress warnings for taking address of TypedReference #80484
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [wasm] Move microbenchmarks, and blazor SOD runs to net8.0 #80308
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Have SIMD Load/Store use GT_IND and GT_ASG where possible #80411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove "promoted struct death vars" map and streamline TreeLifeUpdater #80501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove per-context delegate allocations in netcoreapp targets #80517
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Expand bblocks reordering with common patterns to facilitate propagation of values #80362
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add logger and tests for xml parsing in NativeAOT #80470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP - NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: package publishing is not working #2166

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Publishing Hello World for WebAssembly target on Windows arm64 fails #2121
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Runtime tests generate a significant number of warnings #2165

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix package publishing #2167
  • Patch a GC hole with SDSUs in the IL backend #2164
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: dispatch #2145

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot reference WindowsAppSdk and a WPF library in the same project: There was no runtime pack available for win10-arm #29913
  • `PublishAot` and `NoWarn` (sometimes) breaks `dotnet publish` #29912

Closed

  • Single file is broken in .NET 8 #29602
    8.0.1xx
  • PublishRelease with t:\publish, and Publishing as Release by Default #27066
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce Dependabot for updatig the same dependecies used in dotnet/templating #29907
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update GenerateLayout.targets for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers packaging structure changes #29906
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure Blazor startup succeeds #29899
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • This call is failing on the Darwin leg in installer. #29916
  • Detect Corrupt Solution File in Dotnet Sln Add #28811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix unhandled exception during test discovery on macOS #29083
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29886
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2086863 #29914
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add vb item templates #29765
    Area-Common templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29895
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29746
    Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.2xx
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 7.0.3
  • Re-enable single-file tests #29872
    Area-SingleFile

Updated

  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update NetAnalyzers version for release/7.0.2xx #29464
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.3
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29894
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add *.swp to gitignore template #29866
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    11.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move and add more details for "Double storage warning" section #6877

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OutputWIndowLogger does now follow WindowLogging guidelines #66397
  • False negative for IDE0060 (parameter not used) when combining local functions and lambdas #66391
  • WRN_ParamsArrayInLambdaOnly doesn't have single quotes around its argument. #66389
  • Add `Use pattern matching` diagnostic for list patterns #66388
  • `SyntaxGenerator.Declaration` missing interface modifiers #66387
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName in IIncrementalGenerator and Generic Attributes #66383
  • `default` constraint of generic type is not generated #66382
  • The SyntaxGenerator adds redundant static keyword to constant fields #66380
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` omits accessibility level for accessors #66379
  • The `Simplifier` removes Nullable for return types and parameters #66378
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` omits `in`, `out` keywords for generic types #66377
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` omits `ref`, `readonly`, `new` keywords for return types. #66376
  • Add support for an explicit interface implementation method/field in `SyntaxGenerator` #66375
  • Add support for a generation of a finalizer (destructor) in the `SyntaxGenerator` #66374
  • [Bug] Explicit layout with record struct #66373
  • Switch `EmitContext` to hold a syntax reference instead of a syntax node #66371
  • `MetadataDecoder` doesn't support generic arguments in custom attributes #66370
  • Raw string literals do weird things with unbalanced quotes #66368

Closed

  • bug either in Roslyn or in the C# language spec — example with `ReadOnlySpan` in a `foreach` expansion #62747
    17.6
  • Emit switch for suitable 'or' patterns #45679
    Backlog
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` adds redundant `sealed` keyword for delegate types. #66381
  • Implicit field initialization analysis is firing an Assert #66046
    C# 12.0
  • "Add explicit cast" quick fix produces a bogus fix #66369
  • Report an error referencing method from a module with unrecognized RefSafetyRulesAttribute.Version #64507
    17.6
  • Follow up on changing OptionLogger telemetry key #66115
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2087177 #66401
  • 17.5: Fix issue where Solution-Explorer symbol nodes collapse after a… #66400
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Fix reading VB editor options from ISettingsManager (main) #66399
    Area-IDE
  • Fix reading VB editor options from ISettingsManager (17.4) #66398
    Area-IDE
  • Fix reading VB editor options from ISettingsManager (17.5) #66396
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB, OnDeckForServicing
  • Ensure event handler generation and navigation in webforms works properly #66394
    Area-IDE
  • Add entry for RazorCompiler #66393
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Report double storage warning for primary constructor parameters #66392
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix `this` and `params` modifiers generation #66390
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Report example of unanalyzed node in `NullableWalker` #66385
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit query lambda by `NullableWalker` even without conversion #66384
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow missing CommandLineArgsForDesignTimeEvaluation msbuild property #66367
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Move VisualStudioOptionsProcessor down alongside ProjectSystemProject #66395
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adjust closure initialization for primary constructor #66340
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Disallow more locals of restricted type in async methods #66264
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix `SyntaxGenerator` when generating delegate declaration from symbol #66386
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Report error referencing method from module with unrecognized RefSafetyRulesAttribute version #66285
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Report telemetry event with LSP server capabilities #66334
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into PrimaryConstructors #66364
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Treat `TypedReference` as managed #66328
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Handle compiler diagnostics reported in .cshtml files during build #66355
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, area-web-frameworks
  • Improve our testing of DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader #66356
    Area-Compilers
  • Adding keyword recommendations after FileKeyword #66357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow multiple documents in method debug info #66359
    Area-Interactive
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Move constants to RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #66097
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.6
  • Add test showing incorrect sequence point placement #66363
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit defensive copy for constrained call on `in` parameter #66189
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Block `delegate*<void>...enum` constants in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Delete Compilers.sln and keep only Compilers.slnf #65802
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE
  • Allow specifying expected IL verification baseline #66316
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove CS1701 and CS1702 warnings #66313
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Temporarily stop merging in main-vs-deps #66366
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - Upgrading .NET 6 to .NET 7: "import.meta may only appear in a module" JS error #46073
  • Decide if duplicate EventNames in LoggerMessage is appropriate #46072
  • Add Route Short Circuit middleware #46071
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [API Proposal] Allow Dispatching to Blazor Renderer Sync Context #46068
  • Better way to override default RoleValidator #46066
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json_netty #46063
  • TEST: Automated move to AzDO #46061
  • Blazor AccountClaimsPrincipalFactory CreateUserAsync fires multiple times when refreshing the browser #46060
  • RequireLocalPort extension for IEndpointConventionBuilder #46057
  • Browser is flooded with Correlation and Nonce cookies after logging into Azure. #46053
  • HttpContext property of HttpContextAccessor is null in the ClientCertificateValidation callback of HttpsConnectionAdapterOptions #46052
  • [Blazor] Allow component resx files to be named razor.resx to allow nesting #46051
  • In .NET 7 large number of concurrent requests will memory leak #46050
  • Put the query parameters into RouteData.RouteValues #46047
  • [Perf] Remove extra array allocation when using request filters with request delegate #46046
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Generating code for an OpenAPI Service Reference fails if the path to the swagger file has spaces in it. #45926
    Discussions
  • SignalR with MessagePack: different MessagePackSerializerOptions per hub #45660
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter does not serialize HttpValidationProblemDetails.Errors #45680
    8.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, stage1vanilla #46019
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, stage1publishaot #46035
  • Incorrect target framework for Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.EntityFrameworkCore #46030
  • Blazor Webassembly always getting ERR_CONNECTION_RESET #44763
  • Asp.Versioning Libraries do not add Minimal API version to IApiVersionDescriptionProvider #45972
  • Unexpected parent component rerendering #46044
  • Route Matching mismatching #45922

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46070
    area-runtime
  • Mark API from 7 as shipped #46069
  • Wrong replication of resource names in embedded provider #46067
    community-contribution
  • Enable setting ServerTimeout and KeepAliveInterval in HubConnectionBuilder #46065
    area-signalr
  • Add new "api" project template that supports native AOT #46064
    area-mvc
  • Flags enum provided as list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Fix DefaultProblemDetailsWriter polymorphism #45906
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Update bind:set,after runtime apis (#44412) #46059
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/2.1] Use non-localized 2.1.x links in installer #45409
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 2.1.39

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New Visual Studio 2022 Install - Cannot publish any .NET 7 MAUI Blazor app for Windows _GenerateAppxPackage #12625
  • Java Lang Null Exception when adding Map Pins via Binding #12617
  • Enable Nullable `Controls.Core` Tracking Issue #12600
    Backlog
  • Consider implementing tooltip support for .NET 6 #12598
  • Consider implementing the PointerOver state for .NET 6 #12597
  • Contacts.PickContactAsync(); Throws exception even if rights are granted. (windows) #12595
  • The app does not show. No problem or prompt appear #12594
  • Maui app as exe crashed after 6 hours of running #12593
  • iOS app poorly responsive when many elements are on the screen #12592
  • Mouse gets ignored after writing into a contenteditable element (MAUI Blazor) #12589

Closed

  • App crashes on startup when R8 shrinker is set in Maui - Release mode #12330
  • iOS Local Network permission not requested, can't be checked #12351
  • Many in-the-wild SIGABRT crashes in `MonodroidRuntime::mono_log_handler` #12367
  • CollectionView inside RefreshView causes layout problems on iOS #11440
    Backlog
  • Android enterprise - work profile - app crash, no possibility to run and debug #12427
  • MAUI blazor cannot inject `NavigationManager` into a service #12387
  • UISwitch doesn't toggle the first time if you have VoiceOver enabled #11543
    Backlog
  • App doesn't load on Android #12373
  • Cant Download #12591
  • Shapes gallery currently crashes because of Polygon and Polyline confusions #12364
    Backlog
  • Have better BlazorWebView diagnostics and logging #9792
    8.0-preview1
  • CarouselView does not behave correctly on Windows. #12358
    Backlog
  • [.net7][iOS] IconImageSource exception(Unable to load image file) #12403

PullRequests

Created

  • [net7.0] [Android] Setup `Frame` with all of the missing `Mapper` methods #12621
  • [net7.0] Give fallback width/height for Shapes prior to layout #12620
  • replace ToList and empty array creates #12619
    community ✨
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Preferences API Docs #12610
  • [net7.0] Allow CommunityToolkit to avoid reflection to access the CollectionView controller #12608
  • [net7.0] Update image source after recycling bitmap in custom target #12607
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Permissions API Docs #12606
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials MediaPicker API Docs #12605
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials OrientationSensor API Docs #12604
  • [net7.0] Add BlazorWebView binaries to xmldocs artifacts #12603
  • Add PublicAPI to the Graphics projects #12601
  • only one IndexOf in ListView.UnhookContent #12599
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net7.0] Remove unnecessary Frame set in Shape #12609
  • [net7.0] [WinUI] Fix the size returned when measuring Frame #12618
  • [net7.0] [Android] Fix crash in SwipeView collapsing ListView groups #12616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Add Graphics DeviceTests #12615
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials SecureStorage API Docs #12613
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix crash using DataTemplateSelector CarouselView #12602
  • [net7.0] Initial Commit for third party notice file #12612
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Screenshot API Docs #12611
  • [net7.0] Don't watch for changes on an ImmutableBrush #12614
  • Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #10948
    area/a11y, area/gestures
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12570
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Enable nullable on Controls.Core #12555
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12588
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix shapes and maps types collisions on XAML #12568
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, area/Xaml </>, area/Maps🗺
  • Add more logging for BlazorWebView #12357
    area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • Propagate VisualElement.IsEnabled to children #12488
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12363
    area/shell 🐢, area/toolbar
  • [Build] Mega pipeline #12034
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12574
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Generate everything splash related in the splash target #12481
    area/single project ☝️
  • Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12108
    area/Xaml </>
  • Remove obsoleted OpenGLView #12579
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • added monochrome element to the AdaptiveIconDrawableXml #12564
    community ✨
  • Fix net8 TODOs in code #12577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12573
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #12571

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dbcontext optimize command omits certain characters from namespaces #30045
  • Support for abstract types in JSON #30043
  • Enumerable depth #30042
  • EF Core 7 - Skip & Take with 0s translate to "WHERE 0 = 1" #30041
  • error "The specified deps.json [] does not exist" when executing "add-migration initial" #30038

Closed

  • Obsoletion message for AutoTransactionsEnabled is wrong #29990
    7.0.3
  • In EF7, SqLite unable to load spatialite using the NetTopologySuite Package #29584
    7.0.3
  • Incorrect NullReferenceException for parameter in split query with GroupBy #30022
    7.0.3
  • Support raw SQL queries without defining an entity type for the result #10753
    8.0.0
  • Add DbSet AddRangeAsync overload that takes IAsyncEnumerable #30044
  • Exception during IEnumerable param enumeration pretends to be a query problem #30009
  • dotnet ef migrations bundle fails with `error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'amzn.2-x64' is not recognized` on some AWS Linux machines #29774
  • HasDefaultSchema is ignored for tables created with TPC mapping #30039
  • How can I dynamically check that all changed entries tracked by change tracker relate to same aggregate? #30007
  • @MarounMaroun #30006
  • Invalid object name 'AspNetUserRole'. #29945
  • EF Core 7 - FirstWithoutOrderByAndFilterWarning in simple query with multiple aggregate functions #29782

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/2.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 1.1.15 #29433
    tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30046
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #30037
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/7.0] Fix split query over GroupBy over parameter (#30024) #30030
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Correct [Obsolete] message for AutoTransactionBehavior #30040
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.4 #30036
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • Raw SQL queries for unmapped types #29931

Updated

  • Allow opting out of RETURNING/OUTPUT clauses in SaveChanges #29917
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The installer cache will not be deleted automatically, taking up a lot of disk space #15266

PullRequests

Created

  • Move NetCore.App package to the last step to avoid clobbering #15272
  • Update the repo's readme to include .NET 8.0 source-build instructions #15271
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #15270
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #15269

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #15259
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #15264
  • [7.0.1xx] Update Asp.Net templates #15247
  • Update Asp.Net templates #15249
  • [7.0.2xx] Update Asp.Net templates #15248
  • Remove unused legacy PB_ properties #15265
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Force /p:PortableBuild=true, for cases where we overrode the RID. #15163

Updated

  • [release/7.0.1xx] repos/sdk.proj: set NativeAotSupported=false on arm platform #15039

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #15239
  • Fix VMR synchronization from a local source #15230

  • .NET Source-Build 7.0.102 January 2023 Updates #15251
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Add a script for exporting VMR as a source archive #15226
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Mirror `CONTRIBUTING.md` from runtime into the VMR root #15223
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Remove workaround for https://github.com/dotnet/source-build/issues/3121 #15254
    Area-SourceBuild
